text: www. popsugar. com / Monday, 3 July 2017 10 : 43 : 02 Kourtney Kardashian and boyfriend Younes Bendjima are still going strong! After touching down in St. - Tropez over the weekend, the couple was spotted holding hands while strolling the streets of the French Rivera town on Monday. Hours later, the two were seen cuddled up on a golf cart as they headed to lunch at the Palmiers restaurant before hitting the water on a pedal boat
